data.name: Aron's Adventure Demo
data.detailed_description:
Aron's Adventure Demo

Aron's Adventure is an action-adventure rpg being worked on by two people in Unreal Engine 4. You can follow our progress on (Discord)https://discordapp.com/invite/hgrXkvr, (Twitter)https://twitter.com/aronsadventure or (youtube)https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC46R4bwIOQjdncbSMVRtPYg

Aron's Adventure takes place in a fantasy world called Elor. An ancient evil re-awakens and the fate of the land is thrown into Aron's hands.

The demo is set in the dream world of the Rest, a place where Sentinels go to meditate, gain new skills and learn about the history of the world. In this strange dream join Aron as he explores the creation of an orc from many moons ago.

The mission was created to test some of our latest features. it's very possible you'll encounter bugs, please make sure to report it so we can prevent this from happening at launch! (You can report bugs through our menu)

Aron’s Adventure is set to release on 2-2-2021. We hope to see you there.

Thank you for reading and we hope you enjoy!

MAKE SURE TO WISHLIST!

Tim & Tom.

Things you can expect in launch that are not in the current demo:

  • More open areas to explore
  • A rich story and a fantastical world for you to explore.
  • Better Controller support.
  • Simply a whole lot more than is available in the demo.

data.short_description: Try out our new demo released for the Steam Autumn event!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: I5 - 2500
  • Graphics: Gtx 750
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: I7 - 7700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Gtx 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
